title: Slow cooker orange and honey pulled pork
ingredients: ['240ml orange juice', '120ml soy sauce', '120ml honey', '80ml balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon hot chilli sauce', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 (2kg) pork shoulder roast', '2 tablespoons honey, or to taste', '100g brown sugar, or to taste']
